input2: A woman who has had a history of heartburn and regurgitation.  She also has significant cough.  She feels that during coughing episodes, she has a lot of stomach contents coming up, which exacerbates the situation.  She has had an endoscopy, which shows a hiatal hernia and some esophagitis（LA grades B）. She has a normal motility and a positive pH probe, with score of approximately 50.
